newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - MAY 8.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - MAY 8.

text.p: These were the main headlines reported by Eesti Raadio on Wednesday at noon. Reuters has not verified these reports and cannot vouch for their accuracy.
- Parliament changed the law on income tax so that interest rates on housing loans will be deducted from taxed income.
- Consumer prices rose by 1.9 percent in April.
- Russian President Boris Yeltsin hopes an agreement between NATO and Russia will be ready by May 13.
